attributes.action: Block gaps in dual carriageways in Milton Keynes to stop drivers turning right.
attributes.background: So many people turn right or "U" turn through gaps in central reservations on dual carriageways in Milton Keynes. Even with good visibility and good sight lines this is unnecessarily dangerous when there is always a roundabout not far away. For the sake of driving an extra mile, not worth the risk.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can find more information about highways and transport in Milton Keynes here:

https://www.milton-keynes.gov.uk/highways-and-transport-hub
